definition: Khabarovsk, far eastern Russian city and province on the border with Heilongjiang province of China
pinyin: Ha1 ba1 luo2 fu1 si1 ke4

definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Fires occur on an annual basis in the Khabarovsk and Primorky areas.
sentences.chinese: 哈巴羅夫斯克和普里摩斯基地區每年都要發生林火。

sentences.english: On the penultimate day, we stopped at Khabarovsk.
sentences.chinese: 到達終點的前一天，我們在哈巴羅夫斯克停留。
